custom_data.description: Extra data to associate with the call. This will be passed through to any subscribed call events.

to.description:
Destination of the call that will be transfer. It can be a single option between a number, 
an existing call or a target

call_id.description: The id of the ongoing call which the call should be transferred to.

transfer_state.description: The state which the call should take when it's transferred to.
